/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about reversal of prior decisions, such as
authorization activity jurisdiction in clear and unmistakable error (CUE) cases that sever service connection (SC)
preparing the rating decision
, and
handling cases of disagreement between the authorization and rating activities
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section F  - Reversal of Prior Determinations Related to Character of Discharge (COD), Line of Duty (LOD), or Willful Misconduct
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section F
